main.name: MCAIC 2022
main.description: A Middle School computer science and programming competition hosted by the Middlesex County Academy for SMET!
main.bio: The Middlesex County Academy Informatics Competition is open to all middle school students! It revolves around the theory and practicality of algorithms and programming. In this competition, we will cover various topics such as Recursion, Computer Number Systems/Operations, and Psuedocode. Each school should submit a check that contains the total cost along with the registration form. Click below to sign up!

resume.skillmessage: Important topics/concepts that will be tested

education.school: Hosted by the Middlesex County Academy for Science, Mathematics, and Engineering Technologies
education.graduated: Basics in Programming and Computer Science
education.description: Will consist of two sections, one for short (theoretical and mathematics-based) questions and one for programming problems
